abstract: Vladimir Stojković (Serbian Cyrillic: Владимир Стојковић; born 28 July 1983) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays for Ergotelis F.C. in the Superleague Greece and the Serbian national team, as a goalkeeper.During his career he played for the two biggest clubs in his country, Red Star Belgrade and Partizan, but also represented teams in five other countries, notably with Sporting Clube de Portugal who loaned him several times for the duration of his contract. A Serbian international on 49 occasions, Stojković appeared in the 2010 World Cup.
